resources.string:
\t\t\t\tAn Android application typically initiates with the creation of an Activity. However, an application can have zero or more activities.

\n\n\u2022 The main aim of an Activity is to interact with the user.

\n\n\u2022 It provides the window in which the app draws its UI with setContentView(View).

\n\n\u2022 The hierarchy for parent class of an Activity is as follows :
